Toronto&#039;s Slim Twig and his Mercy Mercenaries&#039; 2008 EP releases in 320kbps mp3. An innovative and interesting approach to music and songwriting as a whole. Worth listening to.

They should soon be embarking on a tour across Canada - get out and support them!
